tours.title: Algiers Casbah
tours.description: UNESCO-listed medina, Ketchaoua Mosque, Palace of the Dey.

tours.title: Tipaza Roman Ruins
tours.description: Coastal Roman site with amphitheater, museum, and basilicas.

tours.title: Chrea National Park
tours.description: Atlas forest hikes, snow in winter, Barbary macaques.

tours.title: Gouraya National Park
tours.description: Cap Carbon, Yemma Gouraya, and monkey sanctuary.

tours.title: Jijel Corniche & Grotto
tours.description: Beaches, caves, and national parks.

tours.title: Tizi-Ouzou Cultural
tours.description: Kabyle villages, pottery, and traditional music.

tours.title: Timgad Roman City
tours.description: UNESCO Roman ruins with amphitheater and forums.

tours.title: Djemila Ruin
tours.description: One of North Africa’s best-preserved Roman towns.

tours.title: Constantine Hanging Bridges
tours.description: City of bridges, medina, and Sidi M’Cid bridge.

tours.title: Annaba & Hippo Regius
tours.description: Ruins of Hippo and Basilica of St. Augustine.

tours.title: Guelma Thermal & Roman
tours.description: Hammam Debagh hot springs, Roman ruins, and waterfalls.

tours.title: Souk Ahras Numidian Heritage
tours.description: Birthplace of Saint Augustine and Madaure ruins.

tours.title: Tébessa Roman
tours.description: Amphitheaters and ancient gates near Tunisian border.

tours.title: Oran City & Coastal
tours.description: Santa Cruz Fortress, colonial architecture, beaches.

tours.title: Tlemcen Heritage & Waterfalls
tours.description: Mansourah ruins, El Mechouar, and El-Ourit falls.

tours.title: Mostaganem Coastal
tours.description: Riverside, colonial forts, and Andalusian legacy.

tours.title: Mascara Emir Abdelkader
tours.description: Sites of Algeria’s national hero in Ghriss Valley.

tours.title: Ghardaïa M’zab Valley
tours.description: Ibadi cities, traditional markets, UNESCO architecture.

tours.title: Timimoun – The Red Oasis
tours.description: Red dunes, ksour, and Saharan sunset experiences.

tours.title: Tamanrasset & Assekrem
tours.description: Hoggar Mountains, Tuareg culture, and Assekrem sunrise.

tours.title: Tassili n’Ajjer Hiking
tours.description: Prehistoric cave art, surreal rock landscapes (UNESCO).

tours.title: El Oued – City of 1000 Domes
tours.description: Domed desert architecture and lively souks.

tours.title: Laghouat Desert Gateway
tours.description: Palm groves, ksar, and desert plains.

tours.title: Biskra & Ziban Oasis
tours.description: Tolga dates, hot springs, and palm plantations.

tours.title: In Salah Mud Architecture
tours.description: Unique quake-resistant desert buildings.

tours.title: Bou Saada Artists & Oasis
tours.description: Home of painter Dinet, palm trees, and dunes.

tours.title: El Bayadh Saharan Plateau
tours.description: Remote plains and nomadic shepherd culture.

tours.title: Beni Hammad Fort
tours.description: Hammadid dynasty ruins in mountain setting (UNESCO).
